column5: QUIET TOP FLOOR with Wifi perfect CENTRAL located Canal front, Beach + walk to Waterpark, free docking for your boat at an assigned Boat slip.  GREAT FOR BIRDWATCHING base to numerous hot spots for migrating as well as shore and water Birds  Lower deck for fishing with access to deep sea FISHING by boat.  Gated Pool and hot top area with sun deck, in a tropical setting. Open floor plan with updated interior. The Coastal Bend of Texas is the place to be;  English, Spanish , German spoken.
column8: TEXAS Island Getaway, Bird Mecca, Fishermans Dream
